xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.3 Hetuduka, Vipākattika » 1.3.2 Vipākadhammapada » 1.3.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Vipākattika
Vipākadhammapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
134.
233Hetu vipākadhammadhammo hetussa vipākadhammadhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
135.
234Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ, paccanīyaṃ.)
235Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ, anulomapaccanīyaṃ.)
236Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ, paccanīyānulomaṃ.)
237(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetvādiup1.3.3 Nevavipākanavipākadhammapada >>
